title: Pragata, Portugal
text: “Everything contributed to the full success of our Qi Gong retreat: the location, the superb rooms, the billions of flowers, the delicious food and all the staff.”

title: Miriam, Netherlands
text: “They say when the gods want to meet they do so in the Himalayas. And I've experienced that...”

title: Mokshananda, USA
text: “I traveled to the Himalayas where I can be absorbed in spiritual life...A natural rhythm evolved as relaxation and rejuvenation transpired.”
